mapper.select: SELECT N.COMM_ID AS commId, N.NEWS_ID AS newsId,N.COMM_TYPE AS commType,N.COMM_CONTENT AS commContent,N.CREATE_TIME AS createTime,N.COMM_PID AS commPid,N.CREATE_USER AS createUser, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=N.ORG_ID AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=N.CREATE_USER) AS createUserName, (SELECT A.HEAD_IMG FROM ACCOUNT A WHERE A.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND A.ACCOUNT_ID=N.CREATE_USER) AS headImg, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NEWS_COMMENTS TEMP WHERE TEMP.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND TEMP.COMM_PID=N.COMM_ID) AS countComm FROM NEWS_COMMENTS N WHERE N.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND N.NEWS_ID=#{newsId} ORDER BY N.CREATE_TIME DESC
